metadata.name: PEPE Have a Dream
metadata.description: This artwork tells about the celebration of democracy in the memory of Martin Luther King Jr. “I Have a Dream”, 1963. A depiction of M.L.K.’s dream seen through the lenses of Pepe’s psyche, a realm of ‘feels good’ where everyone can find complete joy without the feeling of fear. A world where the dream transcends into reality 🌈☮️
